mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Tyler, John, 1790-1862
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Recommends [Henry Washington] Hillard of Alabama for a diplomatic post in Belgium, if a vacancy occurs; Autograph Signed Lettero recommends [William] Boulware of Virginia for a diplomatic post at Naples, [Italy], reminding him [DW] for a letter of recommendation written by professor [Thomas R.] Dew of W[illia]m and Mary College, which is enclosed [Enclosure not included]. Autograph Signed Letter
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1841 March 15, John Tyler to Daniel Webster, Secretary of State, Washington D.C.
